General.Name: Longkou Union Chemical Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Longkou Union Chemical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of azo organic pigments and water-based inks in China. Its products are used in inks, coatings, and plastics. The company was founded in 2007 and is based in Longkou, China.Longkou Union Chemical Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Longkou Sunshine Chemical Co., Ltd.
